name: 伊柏文
objective:
本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構，探討的主題包括: ADT (抽像資料型態) 及複雜度，靜態結構與儲存表示，陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序，搜尋。
This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.
schedule:
Week 1: Course Introduction and overview 
Week 2: Basic Concepts
Week 3-4: Arrays
Week 5-6: Stacks and Queues
Week 7-8: Linked Lists
Week 9-11: Trees
Week 12-14: Graphs
Week 15-16: Sorting
Week 17-18: Final project and report
scorePolicy:
Homeworks: 40%, 
Labs reports: 20%, 
Attendance: 10%,
Final project and report: 30%
materials: Horowitz, Sahni, and Mehta. Fundamentals of Data Structures in C++ (2/E), 2nd edition
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）
